attributes.action: Captain Tom Moore deserves knighthood. We want it for him!!
attributes.additional_details: Recognise Captain Tom Moore as the 2nd time true hero he is and reccomend his knighthood be granted by Her Majesty the Queen.
attributes.background: We want Captain Tom Moore to be granted knighthood for his inspirational actions rasing over £10m for our NHS. The Veteran deserves it.

rejection.details:
We know lots of people want to petition for Colonel Moore to receive an honour, but the Government will only accept individual nominations, not petitions, so we can’t publish your petition.

To submit a nomination for an honour, visit: http://www.gov.uk/honours/
